Com_Photo_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The <clr:0000>Great Goddess Statues<clr:ffff> stand tall
and tranquil, quietly watching over all
of Hyrule.
If I could paint a picture of one of them
for my wall, I'm sure it would keep our
stable peaceful too.
Apparently there's a Great Goddess
Statue enshrined in a sacred place
to the <clr:0000>southwest of Hyrule Field<clr:ffff>...
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But I sure can't find it.<sp:5:0:0> It might be in a
place that's difficult to get to by horse.
Com_Photo_Thank:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh, Link, with the gift of one blessed
painting,<sp:5:0:0> you've wrapped this stable in
a warm, cozy light.
With this Great Goddess Statue adorning
our walls, I'm sure the Goddess herself
will be watching over our visitors!
Com_Photo_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>Huh?<sp:5:0:0> Did you bring me a <clr:0000>picture of
a Great Goddess Statue<clr:ffff>?!
BurnedWakka_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you like our <clr:0000>ring garland <clr:ffff>that much,
then maybe you should go to <clr:0000>Kakariko
Village<clr:ffff> and buy your own.
It's near the <clr:0000>Skyview Tower<clr:ffff> to the east,
so it shouldn't take you long to figure out
your way there.
Com_Photo_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Even a drawing would be fine. As long as
I could just see a <clr:0000>Great Goddess Statue<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0>
I could copy it down and hang it up!
Com_Photo_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you've got <clr:0000>a picture of a Great Goddess
Statue <clr:ffff>somewhere, please show me!
Com_Photo_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It's a real blessing,<sp:5:0:0> having an image of a
Great Goddess Statue watching over us.
Towering over us, really!
If you'd prefer a different angle or even a
different <clr:0000>Great Goddess Statue<clr:ffff>, I'm happy
to copy and display a new one too.
Simply give me the word, and show me
the new picture!
WakkaCharm: Oh, we have one of those!
Com_Photo_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Whoa...<sp:5:0:0> She is...TREMENDOUS!<sp:5:0:0> Both in
terms of size and tranquil beauty!

What a divine figure she cuts!<sp:5:0:0> It's as if my
heart is fuller just looking at her!
Com_Photo_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The <clr:0000>Great Goddess Statues<clr:ffff> stand tall and
tranquil, quietly enshrined all over Hyrule.

If I could paint a picture of one to watch
over my stable, I bet it would make this
place feel even more peaceful.
Com_Photo_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>When I think that the Great Goddess
Statue is watching over me, it makes me
want to work a bit harder than usual!
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>That's right! <sp:5:0:0>Have you already been to
<clr:0000>Kakariko Village <clr:ffff>out <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>?

Kakariko Village is located between two
steep mountains, so visitors to the village
used to be few and far between.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>However, ever since those distinctive
<clr:0000>ring-shaped Zonai ruins <clr:ffff>landed there,<sp:5:0:0>
things have been pretty lively!
Com_Photo_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, yes, was there something you wanted
with the <clr:0000>Great Goddess Statue painting<clr:ffff>?
Com_FirstTime_Only01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now then, as this is your first use of
Riverside Stable...
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Admiration_00>Aha. Our decoration caught your fancy,
did it? Clearly you have a discerning eye!

That lovely little wreath is a souvenir from
nearby <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.

The artisan apparently based it on the
unusual ring-shaped Zonai ruins that
landed over there.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>If you'd like one to take with you, it's only
a short trip <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff> to <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>!

There's a <clr:0000>Skyview Tower <clr:ffff>just nearby, so
I can't imagine you'll have any trouble
finding the place.
Com_FirstTime_Only02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Not only are we celebrating your first use
of Riverside Stable but you've also
<clr:0000>registered a horse<clr:ffff>, so...
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>If you're really that taken with our
<clr:0000>ring garland<clr:ffff>, you should get one of
your own in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It's right near the <clr:0000>Skyview Tower <clr:ffff>east of
our stable, so I don't think you'll have any
trouble finding it.
Com_Photo_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>My mind is made up. I know just what to
hang on that wall...<sp:5:0:0>a picture of a mystical,
blessed, <sp:5:0:0><clr:0000>Great Goddess Statue<clr:ffff>!
Oh, and if you're not already aware,<sp:5:0:0> the
"great" in the name refers to how BIG
these statues are.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>They're quietly enshrined throughout
Hyrule, but not many people know their
exact locations...
The closest Great Goddess Statue to us
allegedly stands in a temple <clr:0000>southwest of
Hyrule Field<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Trouble_00>But all my search attempts have come
up empty. <sp:5:0:0>Maybe it's somewhere that's
difficult to get to by horse...
But I don't need to see the real thing!<sp:5:0:0>
If I had a drawing of the Great Goddess
Statue, I could copy it down and put it up!
Com_FirstTime_Only03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>To celebrate your first use of Riverside
Stable and your <clr:0000>lodging with us<clr:ffff>...
Com_Photo_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>Wait...<sp:5:0:0> You have a <clr:0000>picture of a Great
Goddess Statue<clr:ffff>?
